post_content:
Available for sale are the following cards:

HOF

Addie Joss (Polar Bear/SGC Graded "1.5") [NO LONGER FOR SALE]
Joe Tinker (Old Mill/SGC Graded "1") $325
Home Run Baker (Sovereign/SGC Graded "1") [NO LONGER FOR SALE]

SOUTHERN LEAGUE

George Hickman (Piedmont) [SOLD]
Carlton Molesworth (Piedmont) [SOLD]
Carlos Smith (Piedmont) [SOLD]

Jimmy Hart (Old Mill) $25 [ADDED 10/3/2023]
Frank King (Piedmont) $35 [ADDED 10/3/2023]
Arch Persons (Piedmont) SOLD [ADDED 10/3/2023]

COMMONS

Red Kleinow (Polar Bear) SOLD
Ed Lennox (Piedmont) [NO LONGER FOR SALE]
Frank Delehanty (Piedmont) [NO LONGER FOR SALE]
Charlie Starr (Piedmont) [NO LONGER FOR SALE]
Harry Howell (Piedmont) [NO LONGER FOR SALE]
George Merritt (Piedmont) [NO LONGER FOR SALE]

Please add $10 for Shipping and Handling (if over $100)

If you want to purchase any of these cards:

1. The first person to post "I'll take it" will get the card. This post will secure the card in front of anyone else who may be in communication with me regarding that card.
2. Email me at [url]jmanners51@gmail.com[/url] by putting the name of the card in the subject line and your address in the text.
3. Remit payment by PayPal (PPFF).
4. I don't have easy access to a Post Office so please allow up to 5 days for me to get to the Post Office to mail the card.
